name: Chakmakis & Associates
tag_list: law, legal, lawyer, attorney, business-law, technology-law, start-up, intellectual-property, trademark, ttb, infringement, litigation, california, southern-california, los-angeles, beverly-hills
overview:
Chakmakis & Associates is one of Southern California’s pre-eminent business and personal injury litigation firms. We specialize in providing personalized legal representation and unparalleled results to businesses and individuals. Our extensive experience enables us to offer the highest quality legal representation and to consistently obtain large settlements for our clients.

The firm continues to grow, along with our clients, by providing creative, efficient, and specialized legal representation. Chakmakis & Associates’ cases primarily involve large monetary issues and/or novel, meaningful, and interesting legal issues. This philosophy and the commitment to quality allow us to focus on each client’s needs and consistently deliver superior results to our clients.

Through our business counseling and litigation practice we provide cutting-edge legal expertise, strategic guidance and business advice and solutions to companies and individuals doing business all over the world. Our services and expertise are aligned with our clients’ personal, commercial, and corporate goals. With every matter, we provide the expertise and personal attention of a boutique law firm while providing the resources of a large, full-service law firm.

At Chakmakis & Associates, we seek to build deep and enduring relationships with our clients and we constantly work to understand and anticipate our client’s legal needs. We share our passion for excellence and our commitment to the success of our clients.

Contact Chakmakis & Associates today if you think you might have a case. Our office is located in the heart of Beverly Hills at 301 North Canon Drive, Suite 315, Beverly Hills, CA 90210. If you are in need of an attorney, contact us at (310) 550-1555 for a free consultation.
